name: nicely
content:
nicely adverb
(PLEASANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 well, pleasantly, or in a satisfactory way: Those trousers fit you nicely. You painted the room very nicely. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes until the cake is nicely browned. They said the baby was doing nicely (= was healthy) and would soon be back at home.
More examplesFewer examplesThe children spoke to us very nicely.He always dresses very nicely.The room was decorated very nicely.We were nicely full after the meal.The letter was very nicely worded.
